Sentencas: In this paper, an integrated solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) and biomass gasification system is modeled to study the effect of gasification agent (air, enriched oxygen and steam) on its performance.
Titulo: Effect of gasification agent on the performance of solid oxide fuel cell and biomass gasification systems

Sentencas: In the present modeling, a heat transfer model for SOFC and thermodynamic models for the rest of the components are used.
Titulo: Effect of gasification agent on the performance of solid oxide fuel cell and biomass gasification systems

Sentencas: In addition, exergy balances are written for the system components.
Titulo: Effect of gasification agent on the performance of solid oxide fuel cell and biomass gasification systems

Sentencas: The results show that using steam as the gasification agent yields the highest electrical efficiency (41.8%), power-to-heat ratio (4.649), and exergetic efficiency (39.1%), but the lowest fuel utilization efficiency (50.8%).
Titulo: Effect of gasification agent on the performance of solid oxide fuel cell and biomass gasification systems

Sentencas: In addition, the exergy destruction is found to be the highest at the gasifier for the air and enriched oxygen gasification cases and the heat exchanger that supplies heat to the air entering the SOFC for the steam gasification case.
Titulo: Effect of gasification agent on the performance of solid oxide fuel cell and biomass gasification systems
